"I Want To..." – Quick Access to City Services

At the City of Caldwell, we want to make it easy for you to find what you need—fast.

Whether you live here, run a business, or are just visiting, this section is here to help you quickly access the most common services and info.

Take a look at the list below and click on what you’re looking for—it’s that simple.

We hope this makes your experience quicker, easier, and more convenient!

* [**Animal Control/Code Enforcement**](javascript:;)**:**
  + Report a Lost Pet
  + Adopt a Pet
  + Report a Code Violation

* [**Broadband Internet & Gas:**](javascript:;)
  + Get Info About Broadband Internet Options and Construction in Caldwell

* [**Caldwell Senior Citizen Center:**](javascript:;)
  + Learn More

* [**City of Caldwell Utilities**](javascript:;)**:**
  + Pay my utility bill
  + Report a Service Problem
  + Report a Street Light Outage
  + Request Electric Service
  + Request a Water or Sewer Tap
  + Request a Dumpster/Trash Cart/Roll-Off
  + Find my Trash Route
  + Pay for a Culvert/Curb Cut

* [**Civic/Visitor Center**](javascript:;)**:**
  + Reserve a meeting room
  + Visit the Caldwell Historical Museum
  + Host a special event at the facility

* [**Contact Us**](javascript:;)**:**
  + Email City Council
  + View Department Contacts
  + View Services
  + File a Complaint About City Services

* [**Court**](javascript:;)**:**
  + Contact Municipal Court
  + Pay a Citation

* [**Employment**](javascript:;)**:**
  + Find a Job with the City of Caldwell
  + Volunteer with the City of Caldwell

* [**Film Friendly Caldwell**](javascript:;)**:**
  + View guidelines for commercial filming in Caldwell

* [**Financial Services**](javascript:;)**:**
  + View City Budget, Tax Rate, Annual Financial Audits
  + Apply for Hotel Occupancy Tax Funds Reimbursement Grant

* [**Library**](javascript:;)**:**
  + Get a Library Card
  + Learn about Summer Reading Program
  + Volunteer at the Library

* [**Main Street**](javascript:;)**:**
  + Volunteer with Main Street
  + Attend a Main Street Meeting
  + Apply for Façade Improvement Grant
  + Request Design Assistance from Texas Historical Commission

* [**Permits & Licenses**](javascript:;)**:**
  + Find Out If I Need a Permit
  + Get a Building Permit
  + Get a Fence Permit
  + Get an Oil and Gas Permit
  + Get a Sign Permit
  + Get a Special Event Permit
  + Get a Driveway Permit
  + Get an Oil and Gas Well Operations Permit
  + Get Information on a Liquor License
  + Get a Vendor-Solicitor Permit

* [**Open Records/Transparency**](javascript:;)**:**
  + File an Open Records Request
  + [Fees for Open Records Request \*\*\*](javascript:;)
  + View City Council Minutes
  + View Electronic Records
  + View Charter and Code of Ordinances
  + View Ordinances
  + View Resolutions
  + View Archived City Council Agendas
  + Petition for Annexation

* [**Parks & Recreation**](javascript:;)**:**
  + Reserve a Pavilion
  + Reserve a Field or Court
  + Find Information about Youth Sports
  + Find Splash Pad Schedule

* [**Planning & Development**](javascript:;)**:**
  + View the City Infrastructure Design Guidelines
  + View the City of Caldwell Development Process Guide
  + View Monthly Building Reports
  + View Platting Checklists
  + View the Comprehensive Plan
  + View City Maps
  + Infrastructure Improvements: View Capital Improvement Program (CIP) Projects
  + Apply for Economic Development Incentives

* [**Public Safety**](javascript:;)**:**
  + Join the Caldwell Volunteer Fire Department
  + Join the Police Department
  + File/Get Copy of a Police Report
  + Schedule a Police Escort
  + View Information on Registered Sex Offenders

Tools

My Account

### Section Tools

Hello
-----



Create your Passkey

Remove your Passkey

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.

  
  

Logout
